sentences.sentence: They collect Chinese clan records and transcribe African oral genealogies.
sentences.translation: 他们收集中国的宗谱和非洲人民口口相传的族谱。

sentences.sentence: All Israel was listed in the genealogies recorded in the book of the Kings of Israel.
sentences.translation: 以色列人都按家谱计算，写在以色列诸王记上。

sentences.sentence: Women were usually excluded from formal genealogies anyway, so why did Matthew mention this sordid event?
sentences.translation: 反正正式的族谱通常不会记载女子的，马太为何要重提这件丑事呢？
